altTitles.en: Dad, the Beard Gorilla, and I
Dad, the Bearded Gorilla, and I
Papá, el Gorila Barbudo, y Yo

description.en: After losing her mother to a tragic accident, 6-year old tomboy, Michiru, finds a suspicious person moving into her precious home: her dad's giant younger brother Kouji, the 'Beard Gorilla'. While awkward at first, it doesn't take long for the two to develop a familiar bond that looks more like that of a brother and a sister, than that of niece & uncle.
description.zh:
开心的日子也好，寂寞的日子也好，都是大家大家珍贵的回忆。
在同一屋檐下，哥哥+弟弟+哥哥的女儿‼ 一部有点不寻常的家庭喜剧‼

title.en: The Advanced Player of the Tutorial Tower

altTitles.ja: チュートリアル塔の廃人

altTitles.th: ผู้เล่นขั้นเทพแห่งหอคอยฝึกสอน

altTitles.es: El jugador avanzado de la torre del tutorial

description.de:
Nachdem er 12 Jahre lang in einem Turm voller sich regenerierender Monster gefangen war, ist Hyeonu Kim mächtiger als so ziemlich jeder Mensch und jedes Monster auf der Erde. Endlich frei, ist er entschlossen, herauszufinden, wer hinter seiner Gefangenschaft steckt. Auch wenn das bedeutet, dass er Horden von Monstern töten muss - und dabei ganz nebenbei die Welt rettet.

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/tutorialtower/list?title_no=2892)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/beitazuzhoudelieren/list?title_no=1518)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/tutorial-tower/list?title_no=2394)
description.en:
After being trapped for 12 years in a tower full of regenerating monsters, Hyeonu Kim is more powerful than just about any human or monster on Earth. Now that he’s free, he’s determined to find out who was behind his imprisonment, even if that means he has to kill hordes of monsters -- and inadvertently save the world -- along the way.

---

description.es:
Después de pasar doce años atrapado en una torre llena de monstruos que se regeneran, Hyeonu Kim es más poderoso que prácticamente cualquier humano o monstruo del planeta. Ahora que recuperó la libertad, está decidido a descubrir quién estuvo detrás de su encarcelamiento, aunque eso implique matar hordas de monstruos y, sin darse cuenta, salvar el mundo.

---

description.ja:
ある日、世界中に突如として出現したモンスターと塔。強制的にその塔に連れていかれた人々が塔から脱出するためにはあらゆる試練をクリアするしかない。生き残った生存者は特殊能力を持ったハンターとなり人類のヒーローになるのだ。 12年間チュートリアル塔に閉じ込められていた「佐藤健太郎」。塔の無限の呪いにかかった彼は1349回クリアを繰り返し強力なハンターへと成長していた。そんなある日、彼の呪いは解け塔からの脱出に成功するのだが…！ 気分爽快、ぶっ飛びヒーローの登場！！

---

В мире появились монстры и таинственная Башня. Главный герой стал охотником, но в отличии от других, он не смог выйти из башни после её зачистки. И спустя 12 лет после того как башня была освобождена... Он вернулся!

description.zh:
欢迎来到教学塔
怪物还有5秒抵达战场！
某天，世界上突然出现了怪兽和教学塔，教学塔每隔一段时间就会强制带一部分人进入塔内。而进入塔内生存下来的20%的人会获得能够击败怪兽的特殊能力，成为猎人和受人类追捧的对象，然而他们也会被困在塔内挣脱不出来。

---

description.zh-hk:
在世界各地出現的教學塔，只有通過100層的人才能夠逃出塔中。主角金賢宇和其他隊友一起攻下了100層，卻因為不明的原因無法離開塔中，並再次被送回第1層，只能反覆不斷地攻塔。在12年後，因為突然解除的遊戲迴圈，讓他有了逃脫的機會。

---

title.en: I Stole the First Ranker’s Soul

altTitles.en: I Stole the Number One Ranker's Soul

altTitles.es-la: Robé El Alma del Ranker Número Uno

description.en:
One day, Son Mo-Ah fell into a dungeon and became a gathering hunter.
Son Mo-Ah, who somehow narrowly escaped death, was going to live a normal life but gets caught up in a dungeon yet again.
In a moment of crisis, she is rescued by Seo Ji-Han, the number one ranker, and succeeds in surviving the situation. Somehow, Son Mo-Ah got entangled in a fateful relationship with said number one ranker.

But he said something really unusual to me.

“Promise me that you will kill all the dungeons bosses in this world, as many as you can.”

What?
Hyeun is a genius dancer but has stage fright, and Suhyun is a beginner dancer but is not afraid of the stage. This is the Street Dance growth story of two different dancers!
description.ko:
천재 댄서이지만 무대 공포증을 지닌 혜은과,
초보 댄서이지만 무대를 두려워하지 않는 수현.
서로 다른 두 댄서의 스트릿 댄스 성장기!

title.en: My Sweet Enemy, Thy Name Is Husband

altTitles.pt-br: Casamento Político com um Inimigo Amigável

altTitles.pl: Mój słodki wróg ma imię mojego męża

altTitles.en: Forced Into Wedlock With An Affectionate Enemy
Political Marriage With a Friendly Enemy

altTitles.es-la: Un Matrimonio Arreglado Con Un Tirano Amable

description.en:
My husband, my nemesis. Till death do us part.

Canach Riadon — a slave who rose to become the emperor and the man I wed in my first life. Yet our ill-fated marriage left my family murdered and my homeland destroyed at his hands. Now given a second chance, I vow to succeed in this political marriage and save all I love... Or will his love save me first?
description.pl: Canach Riadon - niewolnik, który został cesarzem i mężczyzna, którego poślubiłam w moim pierwszym życiu. Jednak nasze niefortunne małżeństwo sprawiło, że moja rodzina została zamordowana, a moja ojczyzna zniszczona z jego rąk. Teraz, mając drugą szansę, przysięgam odnieść sukces w tym politycznym małżeństwie i ocalić wszystko, co kocham... A może najpierw jego miłość ocali mnie?
description.pt-br:
Meu marido, meu inimigo. Até que a morte nos separe.
Canach Riadon — um escravo que se tornou o Imperador e o homem com quem eu casei em minha primeira vida. Entretanto, nosso casamento mal-fadado resultou na morte da minha família e na destruição da minha terra natal causada por suas mãos. Agora que recebi uma segunda chance, eu juro ser bem sucedida neste casamento político e salvar tudo o que amo... Ou o amor dele me salvará primeiro?

altTitles.zh: 废柴重生之我要当大佬

description.en:
Ju Seo Cheon, a man who survives the age of war through sheer luck and becomes the elder of the Hwasan faction, only to live a life full of regrets and doubts. As he lies on his death bed, waiting for the inevitable, he is returned to the past…  

---

**Links:**
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/645880)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/15055)
description.ja:
戦乱の時代を生き延び、漁夫の利で華山派の長老となった奏は、一生栄光を味わうこともなく、後悔と未練に満ちた人生の幕を閉じたー、 と、思ったその瞬間、なんと8歳の時の自分に転生したのだった！ これから何が起きるかを全て知っている奏にとってはまさにチートライフ！修行に励み、メキメキ頭角を現わしていく。 今度こそ人生をやり直して、戦乱の世に名を残すことができるのか？！

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/645880)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/15055)
description.ko:
전란의 시대에서 운이 좋게 살아남아 화산파의 장로가 된 주서천.
평생 영광을 맛보지 못한 채 후회와 미련만 가득 안고 눈을 감는다.
​그러나 죽음을 맞이하는 순간, 어찌 된 영문인지 운명은 그를 다시 과거로 돌려보내는데…….

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/645880)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/15055)
description.ru:
На смертном одре старейшина Чу Сочхон (주서천) жалеет о прожитой жизни, полной сомнений и сожалений. Он умирает, но вместо загробного мира возвращается в прошлое. Сможет ли он исправить свои ошибки и вновь прожить жизнь так, чтобы не сожалеть?

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/645880)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/15055)
description.zh:
【每周五更新】朱子墨，一个战乱时代侥幸存活下来的华山派弟子，能力平庸，却因为资历够老而被“剩”为派中长老。然而，这种躺赢般的人生从未令他感受过荣耀，反而让他带着满心的遗憾和留恋离开人世……就在他临死的那一刻，不知怎么回事，命运竟让他重新回到了少年时代！

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/645880)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/15055)

title.en: Hazure Waku no Joutai Ijou Skill de Saikyou ni Natta Ore ga Subete wo Juurin Suru made

altTitles.en: Failure Frame: I Became the Strongest and Annihilated Everything With Low-Level Spells

altTitles.ru: Я стал самым сильным с провальным навыком 【 ненормальное состояние】, я разрушу всё

altTitles.ja: ハズレ枠の【状態異常スキル】で最強になった俺がすべてを蹂躙するまで

altTitles.ko: 꽝취급 받는 [상태이상 스킬]로 최강이 된 내가 전부 유린할 때까지

altTitles.zh: 最强的我最终蹂躏一切

altTitles.zh-hk: 靠廢柴技能【狀態異常】成為最強的我將蹂躪一切

description.en:
Mimori Touka has always been something of a background character in his high school. So when he and his classmates are summoned to a fantasy land and gifted with incredible skills, it seems like the perfect opportunity to make a name for himself.

The only problem? Mimori’s skills are abysmal at best, and he’s banished to a deadly dungeon. 

But as he begins to test these new abilities, he discovers just how powerful he’s become. Can Mimori fight his way back to exact revenge?!
description.pt:
Durante a viagem escolar Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank-E - um status extremamente baixo em comparação com seus colegas de classe. Assim, o personagem secundário e herói abandonado, se tornara o mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.


---
description.pt-br: Durante a viagem escolar, Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank E – um status extremamente baixo comparado a seus colegas de classe. Assim, o herói abandonado se tornará absolutamente o demônio mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

title.en: Uchi no Musuko wa Tabun Gay

altTitles.vi: Con Trai Tôi Có Lẽ Là Gay

altTitles.de: Ich glaub, mein Sohn ist schwul

altTitles.ja-ro: Uchi no Musuko wa Tabun Gei

altTitles.ja: うちの息子はたぶんゲイ

altTitles.en: I Think Our Son Is Gay

description.en: A sweet, open-minded mother starts suspecting one of her sons might be gay.

altTitles.en: Scissor Seven: Black and White Twin Dragons 2

description.en: Sequel to [Wu Liu Qi: Heibai Shuanglong](https://mangadex.org/title/757ffc27-5baf-40c3-9bad-3a1859837936)
description.zh: 不良少年莫浪和高冷天才白其在居住的村庄遇到了神秘刺客,彻底颠覆了他 们的认知和生活。于是两人两人踏上了冒险之路。在与斯特国的较量中,莫 浪身受重伤,白其也在爆炸之中不知去向。当莫浪养好伤之后开始寻找白 其,根据线索他来到了石更国。在这里等着他的,除了那些强壮的新敌人, 还有一个来自斯特国的,似曾相识的人...

title.en: I Became the Contract Daughter of the soon-to-be-ruined Family

altTitles.ko: 곧 망할 가문의 계약직 딸이 되었다

description.en:
I thought I had regressed from this ragged life, but why has my time-limited life remained the same?
I'm ruined... is this how I should live my life...?

"This time, I'll get adopted by a normal family, and live in comfort for the rest of my life!"

Step by step, I'm going to take revenge against the one behind my death, and I'll protect what's left of my small and precious life!

However, did I put in too much effort?

"Anisha, you're perfect."

"I'm going to make this child a future professor."

All I wanted was to survive...

"Well, somehow, you’ve passed. I'll have to adopt this brat."

I ended up with a tycoon I didn't expect.
One whose household will be massacred in a few years!

How do I know that?
Me too! I didn't want to! Know that!

But what can I do? The milk has already been spilt.
I'll just live in bliss while acting as the real daughter during my 5 years contract, then I'll leave!

However...

"...I happened to pick this up on the way home."
"Father, you're the best!"
"I know."

...Something's wrong.

"I checked this out 'myself', and inspected it 'in person'. There's nothing to be grateful for."
"Father, you're a genius!"
"I know this too."

No, well, something's REALLY wrong.

**

I became fond of this unique and strange family, but...

"The five years contract we signed,"
"Let's nullify it."

While looking straight into my eyes, dad announced the termination.

"I can help you, but you'll still die anyway."

Not only that,
But death came under my nose too.

Will I be able to survive?

The stage is the eve of the French Revolution. There is the commoner Gideon, who wants to save the impoverished country side-by-side with the members of the Estates General. Then there is the aristocrat, Georges, who will use any means to achieve his purpose. A man who wants to change the country, and a man who wants to destroy it. Both begin their journey forward. Will their joint efforts of love and hatred, justice and evil lead them to a hell of bloodshed, or an ideal future?

title.en: Kono Koi wo Hoshi ni wa Negawanai

altTitles.ja: この恋を星には願わない

altTitles.en: There Is No Love Wishing Upon a Star

description.en:
Eri-chan is my childhood friend whom I've always spent time with since we were little. Somewhere along the way, my affection for her shifted from being just friends to romantic feelings, but I doubt I'll ever confess these feelings to her. Because I want to stay by her side forever.

And so begins a delicate and beautiful love story where each person's 'love' intertwines.

"The deadline is six months, within which you must kill your husband."

On the first night of their marriage, I possessed the body of 'Alice,' a villainous supporting character who was ordered by her mother-in-law to kill her husband.

I thought I was married off to a duke who's a living  corpse for the sake of money, but lo and behold, this duke has a great body and is handsome as well. Instead of killing him, I looked for a way to survive by using divine power instead of poison.

"Mother, I will become a priestess for the duke!
As a priestess, I shall pray for the duke's well-being for the rest of my life!"

On the day I was about to leave the duke's mansion, my husband who had been unconscious suddenly woke up.

"You're the one who brought me out of the darkness, so take responsibility."

He wakes up and demands I take responsibility after saving him?

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".

altTitles.ja: 斧振りエルフと弓引きドワーフ

description.en: A manga series about an elf who uses an axe and a dwarf who uses a crossbow.

Choi Kanggo was born with a sensitive nose that can smell through a person's feelings. But when a boy who likes him approaches..?!  
  
- [Original Webtoon (Naver)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=5406761)  
- [Original Webtoon (kakao)](https://page.kakao.com/home/55508225)  
- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/le-parfum-de-tes-sentiments)

High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
description.ru: Старшекласснику Кусакабэ Макото приходится работать дни напролёт, чтобы собрать деньги на лечение младшей сестры, страдающей от тяжёлой болезни. Отец безработный, мать сбежала, бросив детей, издевательства на работе… Несмотря на всё это, он не теряет надежды и продолжает жить ради сестры. Но узнав, что ей осталось недолго, Макото впадает в отчаяние. Страх перед неизвестностью заставляет его по-другому взглянуть на ценность человеческой жизни.

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

title.en: Orb: On the Movements of the Earth

altTitles.ja: チ。ー地球の運動についてー
チ。地球の運動について

altTitles.ja-ro: Chi.: Chikyuu no Undou ni Tsuite
Chi. - Chikyuu no Undou ni Tsuite

altTitles.en: Earth。—On the Movements of the Planet Earth—
Chi: On the Movements of the Earth
About the Movement of the Earth

altTitles.es: Tierra, Sangre, Conocimiento: Sobre el Movimiento de la Tierra

altTitles.vi: Chi. -Về sự vận động của địa cầu-

description.en: The setting is 15th century Poland. It was a time when heretical ideas lead those to who possessed such a mindset to being burned at the stake for their beliefs. Rafal, a child prodigy, is expected to major in theology, the most important subject at the time, at the university. One day, however, he comes across a mysterious man, and is now studying a possible "truth" in the midst of heretical thought!
description.vi:
Bạn có tín ngưỡng nào mà không thể bẻ cong cho dù phải từ bỏ sinh mạng của mình không? Bạn có muốn giữ nguyên châm ngôn sống nào cho dù có phải trở thành kẻ thù của cả thế giới không?

Một thiên anh hùng ca tuyệt vời miêu tả những người đang tầm cầu "chân lý bị ngăn cấm". Bối cảnh ở châu Âu vào thế kỷ 15. Thời đại mà những tư tưởng dị đoan bị thiêu rụi.

Nhân vật chính, thần đồng Rafal, được mọi người kỳ vọng sẽ theo học chuyên ngành Thần Học ở trường Đại học, ngành được coi là quan trọng nhất vào thời điểm đó. Tuy nhiên một ngày nọ, một người đàn ông bí ẩn xuất hiện vốn đang nghiên cứu một "chân lý" nào đó trong những tư tưởng dị đoan...!

Truyện #2 giải thưởng Manga Taisho 2021. Truyện được đề xuất bởi Iwaaki Hitoshi, tác giả của "Ký Sinh Thú" và "Historie".
description.es-la: El escenario es la Polonia del siglo XV. Fue un momento en que las ideas heréticas llevaban a quienes poseían tal mentalidad a ser quemados en la hoguera por sus creencias. Se espera que el protagonista, Rafal, un niño prodigio, se especialice en teología, la asignatura más importante en ese momento, en la universidad. Un día, sin embargo, se encuentra con un hombre misterioso, ¡y ahora está estudiando una posible "verdad" en medio de un pensamiento herético!
description.pt-br: O cenário é a Polônia do século XV. Foi uma época em que ideias heréticas levaram aqueles que possuíam tal mentalidade a serem queimados na fogueira por suas crenças. Rafal, um menino prodígio, deve se formar em teologia, o assunto mais importante da época, na universidade. Um dia, porém, ele se depara com um homem misterioso, e agora está estudando uma possível "verdade" no meio do pensamento herético!

altTitles.ja: ファイアーエムブレム エンゲージ

title.en: The Martial God Who Regressed Back to Level 2

altTitles.en: The God of War Who Regressed to Level 2

altTitles.es-la: El dios marcial que regresó al nivel 2

description.en:
[NO. 4212: 'Humanity' has failed the Demotion Match.]
[NO. 4212: ‘Humanity’ has been deemed useless. Beginning deletion.]

Earth lost the fight for survival in the BattleNet system and humanity now faces eradication. However, Jihan Seong is given another chance. He has returned three years into the past before BattleNet became a life-or-death game.

With his knowledge of the future, he’s determined to become the strongest player. Will Jihan be able to change the fate of humanity? And more importantly, can he protect the ones he loves from those who want him to fail?

title.en: Hitokiri Shoujo Koushaku Reijou no Goei ni Naru

altTitles.ja: 『人斬り』少女、公爵令嬢の護衛になる

altTitles.en: "Hitokiri" Girl Becomes Bodyguard for Duke's Daughter
"Hitokiri" Girl Becomes Bodyguard For The Duke's Daughter

description.en:
Shurine, a girl raised for the sole purpose of becoming a bodyguard, is framed by the state and branded a "hitokiri". 

Following a life on the run, she meets Lutecia, a duke's daughter, aboard a magical train. With Lutecia's life in danger, Shurine offers a solution:

"If you need a bodyguard, why not hire me right now?"
The Year is 30XX. A millennia has passed since an event that changed the Earth forever...

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.zh-hk: 我家碰太變成了人類這件事

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

description.en:
Park Dokyeom, who is crazy about sex, suddenly wants to get married!!??

She asks her secretary, Seung-ah, to look for a match for her.

Will Seung-ah be able to find the right marriage partner for Dogyeom?

The Spin-Off to Love Is an Illusion! about Dojin’s older sister.

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダムF90クラスター

description.en: Universal Century 0121: A battle known as the First Oldsmobile War erupted on Mars. The Earth Federation Forces 13th Experimental Combat Group thought they had quelled the Mars Independent Zeon Forces. But the battle for the Fastest Formula is far from over! A new tale from the F90FF begins on Mars... Where all Formulas converge!

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

altTitles.en: Baki Hanma - Son of Ogre (Shinsoban Release)

description.en:
The climax of the Baki series, "Hanma Baki", newly re-edited!

Hanma Yuujirou, the world's strongest creature, vs. Hanma Baki, the world's strongest high schooler... A spat between father and son on an unprecedented scale begins here!

title.en: I Just Want to Game in Peace

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ Zhǐ Xiǎng Ānjìng De Dǎ Yóuxì

altTitles.en: I Just Want to Play Games Quietly
I Just Want to Play the Game Quietly

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Zhi Xiang Anjing De Da Youxi

description.en: Dimensional storms have descended and many extradimensional areas have appeared on Earth. All kinds of mysterious extradimensional lives are born in these extradimensional areas. In order to become strong, humans started to enter these dangerous areas to hunt and kill extradimensional creatures. But I, Zhou Wen, have made these extradimensional areas into instance dungeons in my mobile game. By levelling up my game character, I will be levelling up my strength in reality. When others are risking their lives, I’m here getting stronger by gaming.

altTitles.ja: 二度と自撮り送ってやんない！

altTitles.en: I'll never send a selfie again!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Mi amigo de la infancia no deja de pedirme una selfie para usarlo como referencia para su dibujo, ¿Qué hago?

description.en: It is the manga Umezawa made before his very succesful follow-up BOY and which tells of the adventures of Hibino, delinquent son of God. God gets enough of his son's behaviour and sends him down to earth to better his life and test him. The outcome of this will determine the future of the world, because God won't have his son succeeding him if he doesn't better his life and will end humanity if Hibino fails.

When she loses her calm, she is unable to use magic. In order to become a great witch, Merrily has lived her life according to her mother's teachings, keeping her mind clear no matter what. Then one day, Merrily meets a boy named Danka. As she interacts with him, Merrily's heart changes...

altTitles.ja: 悪魔とラブソング アンコール

description.en:
New short serialization to commemorate the upcoming live-action adaptation of the manga. 

Akuma to Love Song: Encore was compiled in the re-release of volume 8 of the original series, which was released on July 21, 2021.

altTitles.en: The Greatest Sect Leader of All-Time

description.en: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!
description.fr: Ma quête est de développer une secte qui serait un foyer chaleureux pour ses membres. Dedans, non seulement le chef de secte est amusant (ouais c'est moi) mais les disciples sont excentriques, aux personnalités très variées. Ils ont comme particularités d'être en constante évolution et d'être anormalement forts. Tous se révèlent être des gros bonnets, et moi, leur patriarche, je deviendrai invincible ! Approchez, les enfants, rejoignez ma secte et ensemble nous réaliserons vos rêves !

description.en: Tsubasa, the distinguished son of a famous musician, has secret masochistic tendencies that he struggles to comes to terms with. When he chances upon Masaki, a man who meets people with his fists, will Tsubasa finally be able to understand his own desires?

title.en: Tsuitenai Game Jikkyousha wa Akogare no Hito ni Kakinsareru

altTitles.ja: ツイてないゲーム実況者は憧れの人に課金される

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuitenai Game jikkyousha wa akogare no hito ni kakin sareru

description.en:
"Hasumi, a university student who meets with misfortune whenever she does anything, is interested in Oikawa, who helped her out at the entrance ceremony.
However, when she steels herself to talk to him, he doesn't even remember her... Then, at the suggestion of her older brother, who noticed how amusing Hasumi's game-playing was, she decides to livestream a let's play. The video unexpectedly goes viral, and Oikawa has found it too...?

Gaming livestreamer x unlaughing guy—who will be the one to get hooked?"

"If you wish, I don’t mind dying."

The tyrant Ludwig Magenta has met his end at the hands of Empress Olive Charlotte. The moment he accepted death, he opened his eyes in the garden where he first met her at the age of twelve. 

If he starts again from the beginning, can he change his tragic life? 

Only time will tell if Ludwig’s quest for Olive’s love will succeed.

Ohtaka is pissed! University baseball is not what he expected, and it’s all because of Chun, the odd little person who blithely chirps and constantly circles in his tall shadow. Everything Chun does only deepens Ohtaka’s scowl. His irritation skyrockets when Chun demands Ohtaka stay in the baseball club for his sake and steals Ohtaka’s first kiss!  
  
When two people from Chun's past are thrown in Ohtaka's face, his agitation suddenly turns territorial – and he's not sure why…  
  
Will Ohtaka figure out this unfamiliar game that plays for keeps? Get ready for a fast pitch of romantic comedy and surprising love!
description.pl: Otaka jest naprawdę wkurzony! Klub Baseballu, do którego dołączył zdecydowanie nie spełnia jego oczekiwań. W dodatku, cały czas kręci się koło niego mały dziwak - Chun, który ku jego zaskoczeniu okazuje się być kapitanem drużyny. Wszystko, co robi Chun niemiłosiernie go denerwuje, a szala goryczy przechyla się, gdy ten kradnie jego pierwszy pocałunek i zaczyna go szantażować!

description.en:
Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
description.ja: 吸血種<ヴァンプ>と人間の血が流れる少年ソフィは、養護院からクランと呼ばれる施設へと入所した。そこは繭期――人間でいうところの思春期を迎えた吸血種の少年たちが集う学園。周囲の吸血種から冷ややかな目で迎えられる中、ソフィはある一人の少年と運命的な出会いを果たす。劇作家・末満健一の人気シリーズの原点となる物語をコミック化!! 繊細かつ多感な少年たちの葛藤を美しく紡ぎ出すゴシック学園ファンタジー!
description.vi: Câu chuyện xoay quanh Sophie Anderson - một con lai giữa con người và ma cà rồng (Dhampir), bị khinh ghét vì sự không thuần khiết. Tuy vậy, Sophie vẫn vượt lên những trở ngại với trái tim cao quý và luôn đầy tự hào về dòng máu của mình.

description.en: Yurihime August 2022, pages 277-292.

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

title.en: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

altTitles.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

title.en: They Say There's a Ghost in the Club Room

description.en:
I met a friend who disappeared a few years ago, and it turns out he's now an exorcist?!

Jisang often speaks nonsense or acts dangerously out of nowhere, and sometimes experiences memory lapses. His friend and underclassman, Taeju, shares a concern that he has: When the club members enter the club room, they fall victim to strange phenomena.

Believing it to be the work of a ghost, Taeju calls an occult specialist to resolve the situation. Unexpectedly, the specialist turns out to be Jisang's childhood friend, Ham Leerae.

Jisang then learns that his symptoms weren't due to an illness, but were caused by spiritual possession. Determined to keep Leerae around, Jisang offers his body to assist with exorcism requests.

"That's how I can make you stay. So you can't escape now."

And the solution to free him from possession is...kissing?!
description.ko:
몇 년 전 사라져버린 친구를 다시 만났다. 그것도 퇴마사로..?! 

갑자기 이상한 말을 하거나 위험한 행동을 하면서 기억이 끊기는 증세가 있던 지상.
그에게 친한 대학후배 태주가 고민을 얘기한다. 동아리 회원들이 동아리방에만 오면 이상증세를 보인다는 것. 
귀신이 원인이라고 생각한 태주는 문제해결을 위해 영능력자를 부른다. 
그러나 나타난 영능력자는 뜻밖에 지상의 옛 친구 함이레였는데.. 
지상은 자신의 이상증상이 병이 아니라 빙의 때문임을 알게 되고, 이레를 붙잡아두기 위해 자신의 몸을 이용해 의뢰를 돕기로 한다. 
"그래야 네가 계속 여기 있을 거 아냐. 넌 이제 도망 못 간다는 뜻이지." 
그런데 빙의를 푸는 방법이.. 키스라고...?!

description.en:
Shunta and Tamaki are childhood friends with a year of difference, but Shunta feels something different towards his friend, an impure, not correct, dirty feeling.  
  
As this feeling grows stronger, will the relationship between the two friends also change …?

altTitles.en: I Don’t Even Know Your Name

description.en: Nanase Ayane is a young single mother and an omega. Despite her difficult circumstances, she enjoys a happy peaceful life with her daughter Rin. However, the halcyon days come to an end, when she crosses her path once again with the person who left an unfading mark both on her neck and life five years ago...

Ever since his parents died, Watari Nao's life has revolved around his little sister. He forgoes club activities for the sake of spending time with her, leading many of his peers to label him a siscon. But as long as his sister's happy, Nao is willing to shut out any unwelcome comments about himself.  
  
Unbeknownst to Nao, however, a greater danger has resurfaced - one that destroyed his way of life six years ago, and threatens to do so once again.  
  
And that danger, in the form of a girl wielding a garden hoe, will stop at nothing to reclaim what could once have been hers, and hers alone.
description.ru: С тех пор, как его родители умерли, жизнь Ватари Наото вращалась вокруг своей младшей сестры. Он воздерживается от деятельности клуба ради того, чтобы проводить время с ней, в результате чего многие из его сверстников думают, что он влюблён в свою сестру. Но пока его сестра счастлива, Наото готов закрыть глаза на все эти сплетни. Однако ему угрожает та же опасность, что настигла его шесть лет назад. Эта опасность — девушка, которая не уйдет без того, что когда-то принадлежало ей одной!
description.pt-br: Desde que seus pais morreram, a vida de Watari Nao tem girado em torno de sua irmã mais nova. Ele renuncia atividades do clube por causa de passar tempo com ela, levando muitos de seus colegas para rotulá-lo de SISCON. Mas, enquanto sua irmã estiver feliz, Nao está disposto a calar quaisquer comentários indesejáveis sobre si mesmo. Sem o conhecimento de Nao, no entanto, um perigo maior ressurgiu - um que destruiu seu modo de vida, há seis anos, e ameaça fazê-lo mais uma vez, e o perigo vem sob a forma de uma garota empunhando uma enxada de jardim.

description.en:
Without a single friend, middle schooler Chigawa Kon lives on a small island and laments that she hasn't "fallen in love" yet, unlike her classmates. She often plays by "the Hole", a cave near the sea where a man-eating monster lives, according to folk tales.  
  
One day, as she meets with another girl who accidentally drops her smartphone in the sea, they fall from a cliff together but miraculously survive. It turns out Furuka is also all alone.  
  
Published in Young Dragon Age (formerly Bessatsu Dragon Age/Dragon Age Extra), released every 3 months.
A story based on real-life events in 1966. The Sanrizuka Struggle told from the perspective of the peasants fighting for their land.
Mio and Subaru live together in a small apartment avoiding attention. While they masquerade as siblings with an age gap, Subaru holds a secret.
